name: GetGroupCollaborations
description:
Retrieve collaborations for a specified group.

Fetches all collaborations associated with a group, including access details for files or folders. Requires admin permissions to view enterprise groups.

parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the group whose collaborations you want to retrieve. This ID is required to specify the group.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of collaboration items to return per page. Accepts an integer value.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: response_offset
parameters.description: Starting point in the list of collaborations. Must be an integer not exceeding 10000 to avoid rejection.

value_schema.description:
The offset of the item at which to begin the response.

Queries with offset parameter value
exceeding 10000 will be rejected
with a 400 response.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
The offset of the item at which to begin the response.

Queries with offset parameter value
exceeding 10000 will be rejected
with a 400 response.

value_schema.description:
The offset of the item at which to begin the response.

Queries with offset parameter value
exceeding 10000 will be rejected
with a 400 response.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
